title: Sending Students From Diverse Backgrounds to Selective Colleges
itunes:title: Sending Students From Diverse Backgrounds to Selective Colleges
description:
Deborah Bial, President & Founder of The Posse Foundation, discusses their efforts to send teams of students to college together so they can support one another. She explains that nearly 10,000 students have won more than $1.5 billion in scholarships from Posse partner colleges and universities.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
